import { connect } from 'react-redux' class SignupForm extends Component{ render(){ return (
Hi there! My name is setUsername(target.value)} required/> Here’s my password: setPassword(target.value)} required/> Here’s my email address: setEmail(target.value)} required/> And here’s my phone number: setPhone(target.value)} pattern="[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{4}" required/> Already had account?
By signing up, you accept the Splitwise Terms of Service.
) } }
